> "Sigh.... sorry, I overreacted a bit.  What is the situation?"
>

o motioned for his team to stand down from their battle-ready 
> posture.

=
Lord Elder smiled tiredly at Salveo and then also at Talon as she came
into=
 the room. 

He gestured at the command center, "I have as much of it up as=
 far as
I dare. I cannot repair it too much, since it must at least look li=
ke
it has been through a shipwreck."

Lord Elder looked back at the screen =
as he folded his arms over his
chest, his face becoming serious and watchfu=
l as he observed the
destructive work, as quickly and methodically Sweeps w=
ere becoming
part of the earthen landscape. 

"Things are changing for this=
 planet, and us." Elder said quietly, he
looked incredibly tired and almost=
 sorrowful, "The Decepticons came,
and we survived it. The Minions of Unicr=
on came and we have rebuffed
them, for a time."

He looked back at Salveo a=
nd talon, "Yet I can feel that it is not
over, of it ever will be."
